text.create_ticket: Click on the button to create a ticket
text.close_ticket:
Here you can discuss your issue.
Click on the button below to close the ticket
text.ticket_exists: Ticket already exists! Close current ticket before creating a new one.
text.value_big_or_small: Value has to be **more than 1** and **less than 1000**
text.incorrect_value: Incorrect value entered. Amount **must be a digit**

commands.create_ticket_system: Creates a ticket system and sends initial message
commands.clear: Deletes specified amount of messages above
